about.description:
MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for solving
systems of linear equations of the form Ax = b, where A is a square sparse
matrix that can be either unsymmetric, symmetric positive definite, or
general symmetric, on distributed memory computers. MUMPS implements a
direct method based on a multifrontal approach which performs a Gaussian
factorization.
about.summary: MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver

name: mumps-mpi
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: mumps-mpi
    version: 5.2.1
source:
    fn: MUMPS_5.2.1.tar.gz
    patches:
        - examples-mpilibs.patch
        - flang-support.patch
        - shared-libseq.patch
        - shared-mumps.patch
        - shared-pord.patch
    sha256: d988fc34dfc8f5eee0533e361052a972aa69cc39ab193e7f987178d24981744a
    url: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/MUMPS_5.2.1.tar.gz
build:
    number: 9
    run_exports:
        - mumps-mpi >=5.2.1,<5.2.2.0a0
    script: ${RECIPE_DIR}/build-mpi.sh
    string: h272b789_9
requirements:
    build:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.35 h9026189_9
        - binutils_linux-ppc64le 2.35 hd8189f2_29
        - gcc_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h37540d7_17
        - gcc_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h28d0253_29
        - gfortran_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h6e52c15_17
        - gfortran_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h7ffa801_29
        - kernel-headers_linux-ppc64le 3.10.0 hbe0c576_10
        - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.35 h78afe3c_9
        - libgcc-devel_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 hbb93445_17
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 hb998004_17
        - libgfortran5 8.4.0 h9c72879_17
        - libgomp 9.3.0 hb998004_17
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h42fc837_17
        - make 4.3 hf817498_1
        - sysroot_linux-ppc64le 2.17 h8b29623_10
    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - libblas 3.8.0 10_h3875876_netlib
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 hb998004_17
        - libgfortran-ng 9.3.0 hf44303d_17
        - libgfortran5 9.3.0 hf44303d_17
        - libgomp 9.3.0 hb998004_17
        - liblapack 3.8.0 10_h3875876_netlib
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h42fc837_17
        - metis 5.1.0 hb209c28_1006
        - mpi 1.0 openmpi
        - openmpi 4.0.5 hd42b1cc_3
        - parmetis 4.0.3 hbc520c8_1005
        - ptscotch 6.0.9 h50d10c7_1
        - scalapack 2.0.2 hc7fdd6d_1009
        - scotch 6.0.9 h436f3e0_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h6eb9509_1010
    run:
        - libblas >=3.8.0,<4.0a0
        - libgcc-ng >=8.4.0
        - libgfortran-ng
        - libgfortran5 >=8.4.0
        - liblapack >=3.8.0,<3.9.0a0
        - metis >=5.1.0,<5.2.0a0
        - metis >=5.1.0,<5.2.0a0
        - mumps-include 5.2.1 9
        - openmpi >=4.0.5,<4.1.0a0
        - openmpi >=4.0.5,<4.1.0a0
        - parmetis >=4.0.3,<4.1.0a0
        - ptscotch >=6.0.9,<6.1.0a0
        - ptscotch >=6.0.9,<6.1.0a0
        - scalapack >=2.0.2,<2.1.0a0
        - scotch >=6.0.9,<6.1.0a0
        - scotch >=6.0.9,<6.1.0a0
test:
    commands:
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test ! -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq*"
        - test ! -d "${PREFIX}/include/mumps_seq"
about:
    description: 'MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for
        solving

        systems of linear equations of the form Ax = b, where A is a square sparse

        matrix that can be either unsymmetric, symmetric positive definite, or

        general symmetric, on distributed memory computers. MUMPS implements a

        direct method based on a multifrontal approach which performs a Gaussian

        factorization.

        '
    doc_url: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/index.php?page=doc
    home: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/
    license: CECILL-C
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: 'MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver'
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - SylvainCorlay
        - basnijholt
        - dalcinl
        - davidbrochart
        - jbweston
        - minrk

about.description:
MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for solving
systems of linear equations of the form Ax = b, where A is a square sparse
matrix that can be either unsymmetric, symmetric positive definite, or
general symmetric, on distributed memory computers. MUMPS implements a
direct method based on a multifrontal approach which performs a Gaussian

about.summary: MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver
